articles.title: Seventh Congress of WPK to Be Convened
articles.content:
Seventh Congress of WPK to Be Convened
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea announced the following decision on Oct. 30, Juche 104 (2015):
					 The entire party and army and all the people are now vigorously conducting the general offensive to build a thriving socialist nation in high spirits of victors who glorified the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) as a great auspicious event of prosperous Songun Korea, rallied close around respected Comrade Kim Jong Un, demonstrating to the whole world the dignity and might of the great Paektusan nation.
					
					 Under the distinguished and tested guidance of the great Comrade Kim Il Sung, founder of the glorious WPK, and the great Comrade Kim Jong Il, its eternal general secretary, the WPK had developed into the great party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, a revolutionary party of Juche which firmly established the oneness and continuity of ideology and leadership of the great leaders, and had creditably discharged its mission as the organizer and guider of all victories for the Korean people.
					
					 Guiding the revolution and construction for the past 70 years with the line and principle of independence, Songun and socialism as its eternal stratagem, the WPK has trained the Korean people into a dignified and independent people and the powerful driving force of the revolution and built socialism of Juche that meets the popular masses' demand for independence and translates their ideal into reality. It also honorably defended the dignity and sovereignty of the country and the gains of the revolution, establishing the tradition of victory in the confrontation with imperialism that has continued century after century, and provided the eternal foundation for prosperity of the country and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Today we are faced with the heavy yet sacred task to bring about a great upswing in the building of a thriving socialist nation and further strengthen the WPK into the great party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and enhance its leading role so as to hasten the final victory in the revolutionary cause of Juche under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of our party and people, holding fast to the behests of the great leaders as eternal guidelines.
					
					 The Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee decides to convene the 7th Congress of the WPK early in May Juche 105 (2016), reflecting the demand of the party and the developing revolution that witness epoch-making changes in accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Congratulations to President of Cote d'Ivoire
articles.content:
Congratulations to President of Cote d'Ivoire
						
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Alassane Ouattara upon his reelection as president of the Republic of Cote d'Ivoire. 
					 The message wished the president greater success in his responsible work for the prosperity of the country and expressed belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger.

articles.title: Congratulations to Nepalese President
articles.content:
Congratulations to Nepalese President
						
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Bidhya Devi Bhandari upon her election as president of Nepal.
					 The message expressed belief that the historical and traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger, sincerely wishing the president of Nepal greater success in her work.

articles.title: Message of Sympathy to Pakistani PM
articles.content:
Message of Sympathy to Pakistani PM
						
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju sent a message of sympathy to Mohammad Nawaz Sharif, prime minister of Pakistan, on Oct. 27 as regards the recent quake that hit Pakistan, causing many human and material damages.
					 The message expressed hope that the government and people of Pakistan would eradicate the aftermath of the quake at an early date, wishing them success in their work for putting the living of the residents in the afflicted area on normal footing.
					
					 Meanwhile, DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong also sent a similar message to Sartaj Aziz, advisor on National Security and Foreign Affairs of Pakistan, on the same day.

articles.title: Singaporean Delegation Here
articles.content:
Singaporean Delegation Here
						
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Singapore Council of Women's Organizations led by President Malathi Das arrived here Friday.

articles.title: German Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
German Delegation Leaves
						
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the German Asia-Pacific Business Association headed by Executive Member Timo Prekop left here for home Friday.

articles.title: Sojourn of Football Delegation for Reunification of S. Korean Workers
articles.content:
Sojourn of Football Delegation for Reunification of S. Korean Workers 
						
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- A football delegation for reunification of south Korean workers, who came here to take part in the football matches between workers from the north and the south for national reconciliation and unity, peace and reunification, visited the Mirim Riding Club Friday.
					 They looked round various places of the club.
					
					 Earlier, they toured the Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Silk Mill, the International Friendship Exhibition House and Okryu Children's Hospital and leading members of the delegation visited the building of the C.C., the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK).
					
					 Members of the delegation enjoyed a performance given by the Workers' Art Group of the Central Committee of GFTUK.

articles.title: National Exhibition of Consumer Goods Held
articles.content:
National Exhibition of Consumer Goods Held
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The 26th national exhibition of consumer goods took place here from Oct. 26 to 30.
					 Displayed there were hundreds of thousands of consumer goods of thousands of kinds produced by ministries, national institutions, factories, enterprises and housewives' workteams under every provincial management bureau for food and consumer goods industry.
					
					 Among them were newly developed nutritive foodstuff of various kinds, functional cosmetics, energy-effective electric and electronic goods, new kinds of clothes, shoes, furniture as well as various kinds of domestic utensils and sundry goods for daily use made from industrial and agricultural by-products.

articles.title: Exhibitions Held
articles.content:
Exhibitions Held
						
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The 26th National Exhibition of Consumer Goods, the National Exhibition of 206 Sundry Goods and the National Exhibition of August 3 Consumer Goods have been held in Pyongyang on October 26-30.
					 On display at the exhibits are various knitwears, shoes, foodstuffs and others.
					
					 What caught visitors' eyes are different kinds of shoes made by the Ryuwon Shoes Factory, the Wonsan Shoes Factory and the Phyongsong Synthetic Leather Factory.
					
					 According to an official concerned, the exhibitions witness an increase in varieties of shoes, 1.25 times higher than the previous ones held in last year.
					
					 During the exhibitions, it has been carried out at the same time to examine and register new technologies.
					
					 Among applications received are consumer goods presented by the Branch Academy of Light Industrial Science under the State Academy of Sciences and the Nonferrous Metal Institute and technologies for producing foodstuffs.

articles.title: Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition
articles.content:
Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition 
						
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The Pyongyang Cultural Exhibition was reopened some days ago after its renovation.
					 Seen on the front wall of its main hall is a picture of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing atop Mt. Paektu.
					
					 On display at the exhibition with a total floor space of 2 000 square meters are famous works of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as well as over ten thousand kinds of literary and art books, stamp and picture albums, multimedia, fine art pieces and handicrafts and more than 200 kinds of souvenirs.
					
					 Seen in the exhibition rooms No. 1 and 2 are photos showing the immortal diplomatic achievements produced by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un and their great personalities.
					
					 Among the exhibits displayed in the main hall are fine art pieces, varieties of ceramics like Koryo celadon, mementoes and murals showing the history of the Korean nation.
					
					 According to Kim Song Gil, curator of the exhibition, many foreigners, including diplomats and staff members of the missions of international bodies in Pyongyang, visited the exhibition.
					
					 The exhibition is located in Taedonggang District, Pyongyang and was opened in September Juche 87 (1998).

articles.title: Premier League Football Matches End
articles.content:
Premier League Football Matches End
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Premier league football matches for the DPRK Championships, which started from late September, came to an end in Pyongyang on October 29.
					 In this period, a total of 132 matches took place with 12 male and 12 female teams involved, scoring 2.7 goals per match on an average.
					
					 The men's and women's football teams of the April 25 Sports Team topped the list of team standings.
					
					 The runners-up were the Hwaebul men's team and the Wolmido women's team.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Western-Style "Democracy"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Western-Style "Democracy"
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Wars and bloodshed are steadily breaking out in various countries and regions which accepted the western-style "democracy", says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The imperialists are entirely to blame for all these happenings as they abuse democracy as a means for attaining their sinister purpose.
					
					 They use "democracy" as a lever for interfering in the internal affairs of other countries and infringing upon national sovereignty.
					
					 They unreasonably assert that western-style "democracy" is the most universal one to be accepted by the world in a bid to interfere in the internal affairs of other countries. They are forcing "liberalization" and "polycentrism" in the field of ideology and politics, taking issue with economy, education, culture, diplomatic policy, etc. of other countries.
					
					 While calling into question the social system and politics of other countries, they employ the method of bringing down a sovereign state with huge armed forces involved, talking about "offer of democracy" when an opportunity presents itself. 
					
					 Their trumpeting about "democracy" is a curtain raiser to the interference in the internal affairs of other countries and war of aggression against them.
					
					 The anti-imperialist independent countries and those countries which pursue progressive politics are principal targets of vicious interference in their internal affairs being perpetrated by the imperialists under the signboard of "democracy." 
					
					 It is the lesson taught by history and reality that if a country and nation accept western-style "democracy," taken in by hypocrisy and pressure of the imperialists, they are bound to go to ruin.

articles.title: Demo Staged in S. Korea against Opening of Rice Market
articles.content:
Demo Staged in S. Korea against Opening of Rice Market 
						
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- Members of the Federation of Peasants Associations of south Korea staged a demonstration in Seoul on Oct. 27 in protest against the authorities' policy of opening rice market, according to south Korean MBC.
					 They held that the "safe measure for rice demand and supply" taken by the "government" and the "Saenuri Party" could never meet the basic needs of the peasants.
					
					 Calling for stop to the import of foreign rice, they declared that they would launch a dynamic action against the "government" which abandoned food sovereignty.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Moving to Introduce "State-compiled" History Textbook
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive Accused of Moving to Introduce "State-compiled" History Textbook
						
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- South Korean media are becoming increasingly critical of the ruling forces for resorting to highhanded and arbitrary practices to introduce "state-compiled" history textbook.
					 Kyunghyang Daily News on Oct. 28 carried an editorial titled "'President's' speech at 'National Assembly' (NA) peppered with sophism and illogic rhetoric."
					
					 The editorial said that the present chief executive in her speech on NA budge on Oct. 27 revealed her intention to introduce the "state-compiled" history textbook.
					
					 Her speech is little short of a declaration that she would fight against the people, it noted.
					
					 The paper Hangyore on the same day carried an editorial chiding the moves to introduce the above-said textbook.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Mongolian News Agency
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded by Mongolian News Agency
						
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The Mongolian News Agency Montsame posted on its website an article titled "A noteworthy event in the history of the Workers' Party of Korea" illustrated with a photo of the WPK's flag on Oct. 8 on the occasion of its 70th founding anniversary.
					 The article noted in detail that leader Kim Jong Il developed the WPK into an ideologically pure entity, an integral organization and the party which achieved the unity of actions and victoriously defended socialism, holding aloft the banner of Songun despite the severe tests in the closing years of the last century.
					
					 It praised Kim Jong Il for building the WPK into an invincible party deeply rooted in the broad masses and the mother party which formed a harmonious whole with them.
					
					 It said:
					
					 Indeed, his exploits are one of the most precious legacies left by him for the country and its people and serve as an eternal foundation for guaranteeing the ever-lasting prospect and victory of the party.
					
					 The WPK's decision to hold him in high esteem as its eternal general secretary at its 4th Conference clearly demonstrated before the world that his idea and cause will be immortal and are sure to be accomplished.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea War Drill under Fire by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea War Drill under Fire by Swiss Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, October 30 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Oct. 23 in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea joint marine drill.
					 The statement rapped the U.S. for staging a large-scale joint marine drill with the south Korean puppet forces after bringing nuclear carrier Ronald Reagan to the waters off Pusan. 
					
					 It said;
					
					 The U.S. conducted such war drill after the DPRK made a historic proposal for concluding a peace treaty.
					
					 It is reacting to the voice for peace, reason and justice with saber-rattling and war threat. This is sparking great uproar.
					
					 It is threatening its dialogue partner with nuclear weapons while hypocritically talking about the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The fair-minded people of the world clearly understand that the DPRK wants peace but the U.S. a war.
					
					 The durable peace on the Korean Peninsula can be achieved only through the conclusion of a peace treaty.
					
					 The statement urged the U.S. to roll back its hostile policy toward the DPRK and conclude a peace treaty with it.

articles.title: Buro Politico de CC de PTC decide convocar VII Congreso
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a reelecto presidente de Cote d´Ivoire
						
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 29 un mensaje de felicitacion al reelecto presidente de Cote de´Ivoire, Alassane Ouattara.
					El remitente formula al destinatario votos por mayores exitos en sus responsables trabajos para la prosperidad del pais y expresa una conviccion de que se fortalezcan y se desarrollen mas las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a reelecto presidente de Cote d´Ivoire
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita a electo presidente nepali recien 
						
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, emitio el dia 29 un mensaje de felicitacion al electo presidente de Nepal, Bidhya Devi Bhandari.
					Tras expresar una conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion de largas historias y tradiciones entre los dos paises continuaran desarrollandose favorablemente tambien en el futuro, el remitente desea de todo corazon al destinatario exitos en sus labores.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita a electo presidente nepali recien
articles.content:
Buro Politico de CC de PTC decide convocar VII Congreso 
						
Pyongyang, 30 de octubre (ACNC) -- El Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea hizo publica el 30 de octubre del 104 (2015) de la Era Juche la siguiente resolucion.
					Ahora, todo el partido, todo el ejercito y todo el pueblo, unidos compactamente en torno al Mariscal Kim Jong Un, libran la ofensiva general para la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista manteniendo el impetu de triunfadores que celebraron el 70o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea como un gran jubilo revolucionario de la prospera Corea de Songun y manifestaron a todo el mundo la dignidad y el poderio de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					Bajo la sabia y destacada direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung, fundador del glorioso PTC, y del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, eterno Secretario General del glorioso PTC, nuestro partido se fortalecio y se desarrollo como el partido de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il, el revolucionario de tipo jucheano, que mantiene con firmeza la unicidad y la continuidad en la idea y la direccion del lider, y vino cumpliendo excelentemente el papel de organizador y orientador de todas las victorias de nuestro pueblo.
					
					Durante los 70 anos, al dirigir la revolucion y la construccion tomando como la estrategia de eterna duracion la linea y el principio de la independencia, el Songun y el socialismo, el PTC formo a nuestro pueblo como el digno e independiente y el poderoso sujeto de la revolucion y construyo el socialismo al estilo coreano que realiza la demanda independiente y el ideal de las masas populares. Tambien, defendio honrosamente la dignidad, la soberania y las conquistas de la patria registrando la tradicion de victorias en el enfrentamiento con los imperialistas continuado de siglo a siglo y preparo en esta tierra la base eterna por la prosperidad de la patria y la culminacion de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					Hoy, ante nosotros se presenta el importante y sagrado deber revolucionario de registrar un auge en la construccion del Estado prospero socialista y fortalecer y desarrollar el PTC como el de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il mejorando su papel directivo para adelantar la victoria final de la citada causa revolucionaria bajo la direccion del Mariscal tomando por la eterna guia directriz los legados de los grandes lideres 
					
					En reflejo de la demanda de nuestro partido y la revolucion en desarrollo en que se registran los cambios seculares en el cumplimiento de tal causa revolucionaria, la de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista, el Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea decide convocar a principios de mayo del 105 (2016) de la Era Juche el VII Congreso del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
